Title: The Trap
Writer: Melina Pota Koljevic, Srdjan Koljevic, Nenad Teofilovic (novel)
Actors: Nebojsa Glogovac, Natasa Ninkovic, Anica Dobra, Predrag 'Miki' Manojlovic
Plot: "THE TRAP" is a modern film noir reflecting the true face of Serbian (Eastern European) 'society in transition.' It's a story that could happen to you. It is a film about an ordinary man, ...
